DataElement.preferredName: Past Year Average Walking Or Bicycling Activity Per Day Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to describe the average time spent exercising using walking or bicycle riding in the past year.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Past Year Average Walking Or Bicycling Activity
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Activity that requires physical or mental exertion, especially when performed to develop or maintain fitness._Past; before the present time._The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days._The central tendency of a set of n numbers; lacking special distinction, rank, or status; commonly encountered._The act of traveling by foot._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._The act of riding a bicycle._The state of being active; any specific activity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Activity that requires physical or mental exertion, especially when performed to develop or maintain fitness.

Concepts.definition: Activity that requires physical or mental exertion, especially when performed to develop or maintain fitness.

Property.preferredName: Past Year Average Walking Or Bicycling Activity
Property.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:The central tendency of a set of n numbers; lacking special distinction, rank, or status; commonly encountered.:The act of traveling by foot. :An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:The act of riding a bicycle.:The state of being active; any specific activity.

Concepts.definition: Before the present time.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A statistical calculation describing the central tendency of a set of numbers; used to interpret quantitative data.
The act of traveling by foot.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Riding a bicycle for transportation or recreation.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds._In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day._A frequency rate of occurrences of something within a period of time equal to twenty-four hours._Category; used informally to mean a class of things.
